DOC.brief_summary: To assess safety performance MIDI Arrow patient suffer glaucoma inadequately control maximum tolerated medical therapy intraocular pressure ≥ 18 mm Hg ≤ 40 mm Hg
DOC.brief_title: Safety Performance Miami InnFocus Drainage Implant ( MIDI Arrow ) Glaucoma Drainage Implant
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male female patient , age 18 85 year , inclusive 2 . Patient primary open angle glaucoma inadequately control tolerated medical therapy intraocular pressure great equal 18 mm Hg le equal 40 mm Hg 3 . Patient must sign date Informed Consent form 1 . Unwilling unable give inform consent unable return schedule protocol visit . 2 . Pregnant nursing woman . 3 . No light perception . 4 . Active iris neovascularization active proliferative retinopathy . 5 . Iridocorneal endothelial syndrome . 6 . Epithelial fibrous downgrowth . 7 . Pseudoexfoliative glaucoma 8 . Aphakia . 9 . Vitreous anterior chamber vitrectomy anticipate . 10 . Corneal disease 11 . Acute , chronic recurrent uveitis . 12 . Severe posterior blepharitis . 13 . Unwilling discontinue contact lens use surgery . 14 . Previous ophthalmic surgery , exclude phacoemulsification ( cataract ) surgery corneal refractive surgery . 15 . Prior cataract surgery involve conjunctival incision 16 . Need glaucoma surgery combine ocular procedure except cataract surgery anticipate need additional ocular surgery investigational period . 17 . Less 0.1 ( 20/200 ) visual acuity nontest eye . 18 . Infectious conjunctivitis , narrowangle glaucoma , endophthalmitis , orbital cellulitis one , infection , severe dry eye , severe myopia , conjunctivitis fine .
